author: Special Correspondent
text: Elaborate arrangements have been made for the ‘Mahodaya festival’ at Sri Vedaranyeswarar temple in Vedaranyam which falls on February 8. The festival marks a rare combination of New Moon Day, Tiruvonam star both falling on a Monday. A similar phenomenon was witnessed 27 years ago. The district administration has made arrangements for the holy dip of devotees at the Kodiyakarai, Vedaranyam, and also at the temple tank Manikarnigai. S. Palanisamy, District Collector, said that the temple tank would be used only for taking holy dip.
title: Arrangements for ‘Mahodaya’ tomorrow at Vedaranyam
